function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Challenges in communication and social interaction due to physical distancing measures.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for contagious disease transmission in building design and optimization","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited awareness of the requirements for social distancing and safety guidelines in physical space modeling","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Failure to adapt to the new normal of physical distancing in public and private spaces","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of close proximity leading to contagious disease spread in indoor environments","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of inefficient space planning leading to close proximity and increased risk of disease spread","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for contagion in close spatial arrangements","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of diseases in industrial applications","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of spatial layout on disease transmission","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contagious diseases transmission due to crowded physical spaces","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inefficient airflow patterns leading to disease transmission","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient lighting creating discomfort and health risks","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Proposing a constrained optimization problem for physical space design without considering all relevant factors and constraints.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on static design solutions that may not adapt to changing sops and public health guidelines related to covid-19.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient consideration of human behavior and social dynamics in the designed physical spaces, leading to non-compliance with social distancing measures.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dependence on computational tools for disease tracking and analysis","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of computational solutions for social distancing enhanced optimal design of physical spaces","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dynamic nature of space planning due to covid-19 pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Manually intervened, ad-hoc solutions for space planning","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Computer-based solutions for covid-19 management","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Exposure to sars-cov-2 in hospital environments","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Balancing the need for safe physical distance and efficient medium of interaction for communication","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of accessibility to green areas for residents with low socioeconomic status","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Influence of gender and number of children on access to green areas","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Discrepancy in use of specific green areas by urban and rural residents","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Correlation between socioeconomic status and access to green areas","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Changes in access to green areas due to the pandemic","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inequities and exclusions in access to green areas during the pandemic","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Socioeconomic attributes influencing frequency of visiting green areas","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Environmental contexts having a weaker influence on visiting green areas than socioeconomic attributes","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Income level becoming a factor that influences the use of green areas","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for environmental context in relation to frequency of visiting green areas may lead to skewed results and ineffective policies.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Influence of personal attributes and environmental contexts on the use of green areas","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased visits to green areas by households with children","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Influence of household income on visits to green areas","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Influence of personal attributes on visits to green areas","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of green areas may affect the spread of contagious diseases, especially if crowded or frequented by a large number of people.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conducting an in-person questionnaire survey during the covid-19 emergency period","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High frequency of visits to green areas during the covid-19 emergency period","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of high-resolution land use data for environmental context analysis","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of detailed analysis on the attributes of green area visitors","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unexplored influence of socioeconomic attributes and environmental contexts on green space access","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of data on the status of access and use of green areas during the covid-19 crisis","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Change in use of green areas due to covid-19 restrictions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Confusion and disputes regarding lockdown measures in public parks","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reporting of crowded parks leading to unnecessary police intervention","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited accessibility to green areas based on socioeconomic status and environmental context","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inequitable access to green areas based on social attributes such as age, gender, and household composition","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of quantitative evidence for the ubpi technique","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Difficulty in measuring ubpi quantitatively due to the variety of client issues and theoretical backgrounds of psychological skills","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"}]}
